item.title: Flapjack
item.dc:creator: Ian Stark
item.description: This is a dairy-free recipe, based on one from the “Kerry Pure” website.http://www.puredairyfree.co.uk/Recipes/45/Flapjack Makes 16 175g Vitalite 125g demerara sugar 2 tbsp golden syrup (heat the spoon) 350g porridge oats Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease a 25cm square baking tin. Put Vitalite, syrup and sugar into a large saucepan over a medium heat and stir […]

item.title: Oil and Vinegar Chocolate Cake
item.dc:creator: Ian Stark
item.description: (serves ??, oven at 180°C) 200g plain flour220g granulated sugar30g cocoa powder1 tsp bicarbonate of soda½ tsp salt1 tbsp white vinegar100ml vegetable oil2 tsp instant coffee250ml water 20cm square tin Mix dry ingredients in a bowl, add remaining ingredients then stir. Pour into tin and bake in a pre-heated oven at 180°C for 30 minutes […]

item.title: Upside-Down Pudding
item.dc:creator: Ian Stark
item.description: (serves 4–6, oven at 180–190°C) 1oz butterTinned or fresh fruit (pineapple rings, apricot halves)Light brown sugar6oz self-raising flourPinch salt3 eggs6oz caster sugar3oz margarine8″ square tin(Watch out for the leaky tin. Caitlin has the other one.) Melt butter in tin, sprinkle thickly with sugar. Arrange fruit to cover base closely “with an attractive design”. Mix remaining […]

item.title: Chickpea Moussaka
item.dc:creator: Ian Stark
item.description: (Serves 2–4, oven at 180°C) 1 large aubergine, thinly sliced (no need to fry, raw is fine)1 large onion, 1 clove garlic1 tin tomatoes1 tin chickpeas1 tbsp tomato purée½ tsp cinnamon½ glass red wine (or not)Salt and pepper ¾ pt milk1 oz flour1 oz soft margarine1 egg Grated cheese Preheat oven to 180°C. Chop onion […]

item.title: Apple Crumble
item.dc:creator: Ian Stark
item.description: (Makes around 4 helpings, oven at 180°C) 500g cooking apples¼tsp. ground cinnamon75ml water100g flour75g sugar75g porridge oats, optional50g margarine or butter Peel and slice the apples finely and put in a baking-dish. Sprinkle with the cinnamon and add the water. Mix the flour and sugar and rub in the fat until the mixture looks like […]

item.title: Chicken Casserole
item.dc:creator: Ian Stark
item.description: (Serves 4, oven at 180°C) 4 chicken portions Seasoned flour: 2 tbs flour, 1 tsp salt, ½tsp pepper2 tbs vegetable oil2 oz butter1 chopped onion1 sliced red pepper2 oz chopped mushrooms1 tsp tomato purée1 tsp paprika½ pt stock1 glass red wine Skin chicken, shake in bag with seasoned flour (or turn in bowl). Heat oil+butter; fry […]

item.title: Chickpea Pasticcio
item.dc:creator: Ian Stark
item.description: (Oven at 180°) Cross-breed from chickpea moussaka and Julie’s recipe for pasticcio. Onion and garlicTin tomatoesTin chickpeasTomato purée2 tsp cinnamon1/2 glass red wine (or not)Grated cheese1 pt milk>1 oz flour>1 oz soft margarine2 eggs 500g pasta: ideally long thick tubes (ziti?), but rigatone, penne or similar will do.
